tp:treatment-sec.p: Body length 3.0– 3.8 mm ; antenna as long as or slightly longer than body, F15 length 2.0 × its width; anteromesoscutum rugose to rugulose; mesoscutellar disc coriaceous ( Fig. 3C ); vein R1 shorter than pterostigma (i.e., vein R1 longer than pterostigma half), 1 st discal cell length 1.0–1.2 × its width, vein 1CUb 2.3–2.5 × as long as vein 1CUa ( Fig. 3D ); T1 length 2.0 × its maximum width, T1 sub-parallel- to parallel-sided ( Fig. 3E ). Colour: body black; pterostigma dark brown; legs except for metafemur and basal half of mesofemur yellow.
